member.name: T:Text.Str
member.summary: Provides methods for working with strings.

member.name: M:Text.Str.IsPalindrome(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if a string is a palindrome.
member.returns: True if the string is a palindrome, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Text.Str.CleanString(System.String)
member.summary: Removes spaces and punctuation from a string and converts it to lowercase.

member.name: M:Text.Str.IsPalindromeCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given string is a palindrome.
member.returns: True if the string is a palindrome, otherwise false.
